electronInteractions.launchInsertAudioFileDialogue: Load new audio file into the show
electronInteractions.launchImportMusicXmlFileDialogue: Import MusicXML file to get measures

batchEditing.setAllMarchersToPreviousPage: Set all marcher coordinates to previous page
batchEditing.setSelectedMarchersToPreviousPage: Set selected marcher(s) coordinates to previous page
batchEditing.setAllMarchersToNextPage: Set all marcher coordinates to next page
batchEditing.setSelectedMarchersToNextPage: Set selected marcher(s) coordinates to next page

cursorMode.applyQuickShape: Snaps marchers to shape without creating an editable object
cursorMode.createMarcherShape: Creates a new shape with lines or curves that can be edited across pages
cursorMode.alignmentEventLine: Create a line out of the selected marchers
